items.summary: Add a GiftPackForm component in frontend/src/components/admin that allows admins to create new gift packs with fields for: pack ID, title, description, price, discount percentage, category selection, image URL, basket type selection, and size selection. Use react-hook-form for validation and shadcn/ui components matching the existing ProductForm pattern.

Add a GiftPackList component in frontend/src/components/admin that displays all existing gift packs in a grid layout showing: image, title, price, discount, category, basket type, and size. Include loading states and empty state handling.

Add a GiftPackManagement component in frontend/src/components/admin that combines GiftPackForm and GiftPackList. Handle gift pack creation via the existing useProductMutation hook, display success/error toast notifications, and reset the form on successful creation.

Update the AdminPage component to add a fourth management section for Gift Packs alongside the existing Categories, Products, and Coupons sections. Display the GiftPackManagement component in a Card with appropriate title and description.
